com.cornell.opencomm.rtpstreamer
Class G711

java.lang.Object
  com.cornell.opencomm.rtpstreamer.G711

public class G711
extends Object

G.711 codec. This class provides methods for u-law, A-law and linear PCM conversions. Taken from r473 of Sipdroid's G711 class (sipdroid.org).

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static void alaw2linear(byte[] alaw, short[] lin, int frames)
          Converts a sound buffer from PCM A-law to linear PCM.

          Converts a sound buffer from linear PCM to PCM A-law.

          Converts a sound buffer from linear PCM to PCM mu-law.
static void ulaw2linear(byte[] ulaw, short[] lin, int frames)
          Converts a sound buffer from PCM mu-law to linear PCM.

Method Detail

alaw2linear

public static void alaw2linear(byte[] alaw,
                               short[] lin,
                               int frames)
Converts a sound buffer from PCM A-law to linear PCM.

Parameters:
alaw - Array that contains the PCMA data.
lin - Array that will contain the converted linear PCM data.
frames - Number of frames in the sound buffer.

linear2alaw

public static void linear2alaw(short[] lin,
                               int offset,
                               byte[] alaw,
                               int frames)
Converts a sound buffer from linear PCM to PCM A-law.

Parameters:
lin - Array that contains the linear PCM data.
offset - Where in the lin array the data starts.
alaw - Array that will contain the converted A-law data.
frames - Number of frames in the sound buffer.

ulaw2linear

public static void ulaw2linear(byte[] ulaw,
                               short[] lin,
                               int frames)
Converts a sound buffer from PCM mu-law to linear PCM.

Parameters:
ulaw - Array that contains the PCMU data.
lin - Array that will contain the converted linear PCM data.
frames - Number of frames in the sound buffer.

linear2ulaw

public static void linear2ulaw(short[] lin,
                               int offset,
                               byte[] ulaw,
                               int frames)
Converts a sound buffer from linear PCM to PCM mu-law.

Parameters:
lin - Array that contains the linear PCM data.
offset - Where in the lin array the data starts.
ulaw - Array that will contain the converted mu-law data.
frames - Number of frames in the sound buffer.
